sources.title: Crooked River (1950) COLORIZED | Classic Cowboy Western | Full Movie
sources.description:
Raw-fisted heroes whose blasting guns & blazing courage brought peace to the rangelands! 
Shamrock Ellison is searching for the killer of his parents, while Lucky Hayden is a not-so-bad bandit leader. The West cheered their names! 

Watch the Black & White version: https://youtu.be/W3DaikgjnrQ
Director: Thomas Carr
Writers: Ron Ormond, Maurice Tombragel
Stars: James Ellison, Russell Hayden, Raymond Hatton, Fuzzy Knight, Julie Adams, Tom Tyler
Genre: Classics, Western

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: After Shamrock breaks up a stage robbery attempt by Kent and his men, he trails them to their hideout. Posing as an outlaw he joins them and meets their leader Lucky. But Kent and the others soon quit Lucky to go with the more famous outlaw Gentry. Shamrock learns of their plans and organizes a posse to face them in a showdown.
metadata.Actors: James Ellison, Russell Hayden, Raymond Hatton
